Generation VIII.Sword: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.
Generation VIII.Shield: It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Silicobra’s neck pouch, which can inflate and deflate like a balloon, gets more elastic each time Silicobra sheds its skin.
Generation IX.Violet: Silicobra's large nostrils are specialized for spraying sand, so this Pokémon is not very good at telling apart different smells.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 6 Dusty Bowl ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 6 Dusty Bowl ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Forest of Focus , Training Lowlands , Challenge Road , Potbottom Desert

Generation IX.Scarlet: East Province: Area Three West Province: Asado Desert Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
Generation IX.Violet: East Province: Area Three West Province: Asado Desert Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
